A 𐌰 AHSA Einer 1 AIN/AR 𐌰 vs AL 𐌻 aza:Ashur 𐌰:HERR 𐌰𐍄𐍄𐌰 VateR / asks:ash / Esche? 𐌰𐌼𐍃=arms Ar:𐌰 vs Ra:𐍂
B 𐌱 BAIRKAN bercna:Birke
C 𐌾 JER Gero:Year 𐌲 ɕ⋍tj⋍cj Caesar⇔Jesus 𐍆𐍂𐌰𐌿𐌾𐌰 = Franka Frauja 𐌾𐌹𐌿𐌺𐌰𐌽=conquern 𐌰𐌻𐌾𐌰𐌻𐌴𐌹𐌺𐍉𐌽=allegorical
D 𐌳 TAGS/DAGS daaz:"days" DelTa: 𐍅𐌰𐌳𐌳=Wedel>Wall DT! 𐌱𐍂𐌰𐌹𐌳𐌴𐌹=breadth/Breite 𐌳𐌿𐌱𐍉 Taube

F 𐍆 FAIHU fe:Viech, Vieh, viel
G 𐌲 nGIBA geuua:gift Kiefer 𐌰𐌲𐌲𐌴𐌻=ANGEL 𐌰𐌲𐌹𐍃=ANGST 𐌾 𐍅:WG/VR
H 𐌷 HAGL haal:hail/Hagel 𐌰𐌷𐌼𐌰=Atem 𐌷<TH! just like hebrew, but mostly true H (hate,...)

Gothic_lemmas
Gothic suffixes

Goth shows traces of the presumably homogeneous language of EEF, with Basque as only known survivor:
to bite | kosk egin | 𐌺𐌰𐌿𐍃. 𐌾𐌰𐌽 ( egin : goin/doin )
